faqs.a: Minimind is your all-in-one AI assistant for writing, translating, improving content, replying to emails, and editing images using powerful AI models.

faqs.q: Do I need an account to use Minimind?
faqs.a: Yes. You must sign in with your Google account to access all features and track your token usage securely.

faqs.q: What are tokens and how do they work?
faqs.a: Tokens are digital credits used to access premium features in Minimind. Each AI action costs a certain number of tokens. The exact cost is shown before use.

faqs.q: How can I purchase more tokens?
faqs.a: Click the diamond icon in the top bar or go to the ‚ÄúPurchase Tokens‚Äù section. You can pay using secure Stripe checkout.
No. All token purchases are final and non-refundable unless required by law.

faqs.q: Why did the AI output something incorrect or strange?
faqs.a: AI results are based on probability and patterns. Minimind cannot guarantee accuracy. Please review results before using them in professional or sensitive contexts.

faqs.q: Can Minimind translate between any languages?
faqs.a: Minimind supports English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese. More languages may be added in the future.

faqs.q: Does Minimind store my content or chat history?
faqs.a: Only chat history is stored for signed-in users. Your content is never used to train models or shared with third parties.

faqs.q: What should I do if I encounter a bug or issue?
faqs.a: Try refreshing your browser and ensuring you're signed in. If the issue continues, contact support at inquiry@minimind.pro.

faqs.q: Can I use Minimind-generated content for commercial purposes?
faqs.a: Yes, but you do so at your own risk. Review AI-generated content before using it in public or commercial settings.
